description: This Python source file contains functions for generating RPC (Remote Procedure Call) emitter code, including registration and deregistration of methods, event handling, and versioning, specifically tailored for a JSON-RPC based plugin framework. It programmatically constructs C++ code snippets for RPC communication based on schema definitions.

classes.name: AppendTest
classes.description: A class imported from class_emitter module, used for appending test code or validation within code generation.

methods.name: EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False)
methods.description: Generates C++ code to emit a specific event, including structuring the event prototype, converting parameters to JSON, and handling notification logic.

methods.name: _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])
methods.description: Generates the header and namespace setup code for the RPC implementation, including includes and namespace openings.

methods.name: _EmitVersionCode(emit, version)
methods.description: Outputs C++ code defining the version constants for the RPC framework.

methods.name: _EmitRpcCode(root, emit, ns, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Generates the bulk of the RPC registration, method, and event code, including method signatures, registration, deregistration, and event handling registration.

methods.name: EmitRpcCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Main entry point that generates the full RPC code including prologue, main code, and epilogue.

methods.name: EmitRpcVersionCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Wrapper to generate versioning code along with the main RPC code.

methods.name: _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")

ctags.name: EmitEvent
ctags.pattern: /^def EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False):$/

ctags.name: _EmitRpcPrologue
ctags.pattern: /^def _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = []):$/
ctags.signature: (root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])

ctags.name: _Invoke
ctags.pattern: /^            def _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", re/
ctags.signature: (params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")
